thread.title: Goldman Sachs securities division chiefs to leave firm

author: Liz Hoffman
title: Goldman Sachs securities division chiefs to leave firm

organizations.name: trading goldman sachs securities division chiefs

text:
Trading Goldman Sachs securities division chiefs to leave firm Pablo Salame and Isabelle Ealet, two of three executives who oversee the firm’s securities unit, are expected to leave next month By Liz Hoffman May 14, 2018 Updated: 3:48 p.m. GMT
Goldman Sachs is shaking up the leadership of its trading arm, which has struggled in recent years, The Wall Street Journal reports.
Pablo Salame and Isabelle Ealet, two of three executives who oversee Goldman’s powerful securities division, will leave the firm next month, according to a memo reviewed by WSJ.
Their exit leaves Ashok Varadhan... To Read the Full Story Subscribe Sign In Filter by Topic
